symlink-config.silent.description: Silent mode - no VS Studio information messages.

symlink-config.scriptGenerationOS.description: Which platforms to generate scripts for. Auto detects current platform.

symlink-config.symlinkPathMode.description: Generate symlinks with relative paths from workspace root or absolute paths.

symlink-config.scriptGenerationMode.description: Generate complete scripts with all operations or incremental scripts with only changes.

symlink-config.watchWorkspace.description: Enable automatic workspace watching and updating configuration. When disabled, use Refresh command to manually update.

symlink-config.hideServiceFiles.description: Automatically hide service files from VSCode Explorer.

symlink-config.hideSymlinkConfigs.description: Automatically hide symlink-config.json files from VSCode Explorer.

symlink-config.projectRoot.description: Project root path for symlink operations. Auto-calculated from workspace folders.
symlink-config.projectRoot.markdownDescription: Project root path for symlink operations. Auto-calculated from workspace folders. [â‹¯ Pick Directory](command:symlink-config.pickProjectRoot)

symlink-config.continuousMode.description: Enable continuous symlink management - automatically apply/clean symlinks on configuration changes.

symlink-config.maxLogEntries.description: Maximum number of log entries before auto-clear. Set to 0 for unlimited.

symlink-config.resetToDefaults.description: Reset all settings to defaults. This setting will automatically turn off after reset.
